mapper.insert: insert into project_members (repo_id, user_id, created_at, ext_ref_id) values (#{repoId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{extRefId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into project_members
repo_id,
user_id,
created_at,
ext_ref_id,
